osgART::GenericVideoShader

osgART::GenericVideoShader Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Encapsulate a shader effect for video objects. A video shader can be apply to a VideoObject.


Public Member Functions

 GenericVideoShader ()
 default constructor.
